Types

Query = object
  query*: string
  variables*: Variables

Variables = Table[string, string]

  url*: string

Procs

proc dumpHook(s: var string; v: Variables) {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc newClient(url: string): ZuhyoClient {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Create a new zuhyo client .. code:: nim let api = zuhyo.newClient("<some_url>") 
proc newQuery(body: string; v: Variables): Query {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Create a query from body using variables v .. code:: nim let query = newQuery("<query_text>", vars {"<var_name>": "<var_val>"}) 
proc readQuery(filename: string; v: Variables): Query {....raises: [IOError],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect], forbids: [].}
Read a graphql query from filename and use the variables v .. code:: nim let query = "<some_filename>".readQuery(vars {"<var_name>": "<var_val>"}) 
proc request(api: ZuhyoClient; query: Query): Response {.
    ...raises: [CatchableError, PuppyError], tags: [], forbids: [].}

Request a response from the api provided in ZuhyoClient using the query .. code:: nim let api = zuhyo.newClient("<some_url>") query = "<some_filename>".readQuery(vars {"<var_name>": "<var_val>"}) req = api.request(query)

echo req.code echo req.headers echo req.body

Templates

template vars[A, B](ctx: openArray[(A, B)]): Variables
Converts a table into the Variables type .. code:: nim let someVariables = vars {"<var_name>": "<var_val>"}
